name: LIV // FURNITURE SONGS
description:
## SOUND ON ##

The second song of the album "Furniture Songs", composed by Gabriel Politzer; sound artist, musician and biologist from Rio de Janeiro.

The composition originates in his apartment, near Av. Paulista in the city of São Paulo, in the apocalyptic and chaotic context of the pandemic in Brazil. LIV is a reference to the time signature of the song, 5/4, in roman numbers. Energetic and odd to dance, this music goes well on a sunny day at the beach.
The process of creation and production was minimalist done, only with a laptop, a headset and a lot of research on musical theory. Inspired by the DIY culture, "Furniture Songs" shows that virtually anyone can create their sounds without the need for expensive and specific equipment and hard work.

Track: 2 of 6
Genres: Chill-Out, Ambient, Lo-Fi
Master: Rodrigo Paschoal
Release Date: Apr 30, 2021
